description: Number of Boolean functions of n variables from Post class F(8,inf); number of degenerate Boolean functions of n variables.
references: T. E. Allen, J. Goldsmith, N. Mattei, Counting, Ranking, and Randomly Generating CP-nets, 2014; http://cs.engr.uky.edu/~goldsmit/papers/gen-cpnets.pdf
Y. Raekow and K. Ziegler, A taxonomy of non-cooperatively computable functions, Presented at WEWoRC 2011 (conference record: http://tinyurl.com/3orssf6).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
I. Tomescu, Introducere in Combinatorica. Editura Tehnica, Bucharest, 1972, p. 129.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..12
Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _R. K. Guy_
extensions: More terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda
